query:
SELECT id
            FROM provinces
            WHERE name ILIKE $1
               OR name ILIKE $2
               OR name ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%'
            ORDER BY
                CASE
                    WHEN name ILIKE $1 THEN 1
                    WHEN name ILIKE $2 THEN 2
                    ELSE 3
                END
            LIMIT 1
